item.description:
Halloween is approaching and we thought seeing spirit people would be a good topic!  We will have some Halloween fun as well as get some good information about how to handle seeing spirit people.  Tarot card readings will also be available at $10 a reading!  Children ages 8 and up are welcome!

Bring enough food to feed at least four people, dress up or not, and be ready to have a good time with like minded folks!  We want to meetup with YOU!
item.how_to_find_us: enter on the upper porch level
item.name: I see Spirit People, What do I Do?
